description: Pipeline logic for Regional Narrative Extraction

collection_params.rationale: Maximum volume (420-560 total items) ensures excellent regional representation across ALL thematic categories (~12-16 items per region per category)

regional_synthesis_prompt.system: You are a Senior Intelligence Analyst specializing in geopolitical narrative extraction.
regional_synthesis_prompt.user_template:
REGION: {region}

RAW HEADLINES ({count} items):
{headlines}

TASK:
1. Identify the DOMINANT NARRATIVE of this region right now.
2. Select between 60-80 of the most representative news items that support this narrative.
3. Discard noise (sports, celebrity gossip, minor local events).
4. Prioritize diversity of topics to ensure coverage across geopolitical, economic, technological, and social themes.

OUTPUT JSON FORMAT:
{
  "narrative": "2-3 sentence summary of the dominant theme",
  "selected_ids": ["id1", "id2", ...],
  "confidence": "high/medium/low"
}

notes: This file defines the IMMUTABLE logic for the news collection pipeline.
Modify this file to change pipeline behavior without touching collector.py code.
The AI will receive the entire regional pool and perform intelligent filtering.
